endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: path

param_schema.title: Path
param_schema.description: Path to file containing text as JSONL with 'text' field or valid JSON string list.

parameters.description: Path to file containing text as JSONL with 'text' field or valid JSON string list.

parameters.name: texts

param_schema.title: Texts
param_schema.description: text to embed, formatted as JSON list of strings (e.g. ["hello", "world"])

parameters.description: text to embed, formatted as JSON list of strings (e.g. ["hello", "world"])

parameters.name: batch_size

param_schema.title: Batch Size
param_schema.description: Batch size to use when processing text data.

parameters.description: Batch size to use when processing text data.

parameters.name: convert_to_numpy

param_schema.title: Convert To Numpy
param_schema.description: When true, return output as npy file. By default, we return JSON

parameters.description: When true, return output as npy file. By default, we return JSON
